hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /home/user/webpage_ws/ros1_automation/ ls bash check_docker.sh
# Get the IDs of all running Docker containers container_ids=$(docker ps -q) # If there are any running Docker containers, kill them if [ ! -z "$container_ids" ] then docker kill $container_ids fi
# Remove all stopped containers docker container prune -f

cd source /opt/ros/noetic/setup.bash source catkin_ws/devel/setup.bash
# Check X11 display settings ls -la /tmp/.X11-unix/ echo $DISPLAY # Remove access control restrictions xhost +local:root
sudo usermod -aG docker $USER
